AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child of the Kingdom's Cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a cook in the kingdom of Mofy. He learned many ways of cooking from his parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child of the Kingdom's Builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a builder in the kingdom of Mofy. He learned many ways of building from his parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child of the Kingdom's Crafter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a crafter in the kingdom of Mofy. He learned many ways of crafting from his parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child of the Kingdom's Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a doctor in the kingdom of Mofy. He learned many ways of medicine from his parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child of the Kingdom's Warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a Warrior in the kingdom of Mofy. He learned many ways of fighting from his parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child of the Kingdom's Hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a Warrior in the kingdom of Mofy. He learned many ways of Hunting from his parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child of the Kingdom's Noble
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a Noble in the kingdom of Mofy. He learned many ways of trading from his parents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kingdom's Cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was appointed as a cook and worked hard every day to cook food for the kingdom.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kingdom's Builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was appointed architect and was involved in the construction of defensive walls and weapons to strengthen the kingdom's defenses.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kingdom's Crafter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was appointed as a crafter and manufactured weapons for use in the kingdom.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kingdom's Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was appointed as a doctor and spent most of her time in the kingdom treating the injured.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kingdom's Warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was appointed a warrior and faced the enemy in battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kingdom's Hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned as a hunter and hunted animals to secure food.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kingdom's Noble
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has been appointed to the nobility. Only a handful of Mofy can hold this position as this is a key role in diplomacy and trade.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farmed Mofy
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was farmed Mofy as a labor and food source.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Abandoned Mofy
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Mofy that was abandoned for one reason or another.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cattle
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was spending her days waiting to be sold in the slavers' market as food for a different race of people.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to slavers as a slave to perform labor.
